ctx: intros p sigma u st' out ms q Hhandler Hlocks Hlocks_locked Hinv.
exceptions.exn: In environment num_Clients : nat p : packet sigma : name -> Data u : Label st' : Data out : list Output ms : list (Name * Msg) q : packet Hhandler : NetHandler (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (u, out, st', ms) Hlocks : locks_correct sigma Hlocks_locked : pBody q = Locked -> exists c : Client_index, valid_locked (queue (sigma Server)) (held (sigma (Client c))) c q Hinv : LockServ_network_network_invariant p q e : pDst p = pDst p Heq : name_eq_dec (pDst p) (pDst p) = left e Unable to unify "pBody q = Locked -> exists c : Client_index, valid_locked (queue (sigma Server)) (held (sigma (Client c))) c q" with "pBody q = Locked -> exists c : Client_index, valid_locked (queue (if name_eq_dec Server (pDst p) then st' else sigma Server)) (held (if name_eq_dec (Client c) (pDst p) then st' else sigma (Client c))) c q".

ctx: intros p sigma u st' out ms q Hhandler Hlocks Hlocks_locked Hinv.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros p sigma u st' out ms q Hhandler Hlocks Hlocks_locked Hinv. unfold locks_correct_locked in *. unfold update. destruct (name_eq_dec (pDst p) (pDst p)) eqn:Heq. - apply Hlocks_locked. - congruence.
